attributes.action: Expel Brunei’s High Commisioner to the UK in response to anti-LGBTQ Sharia laws
attributes.background: Recent news brings Brunei and its introduction of shocking Sharia laws into the limelight. The laws introduced mean gay men caught having sex could be subject to death by stoning, while gay women could face up to 40 strokes of the cane. As a commonwealth nation, the UK should take immediate action.
